column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Negative: Reservations are hard to come by
column2: so we've always booked our visits well in advance. We've noticed Bavette's has changed their booking policy so reservations can only be made 30 days in advance (specifically on Resy.) Unfortunately
column3: no matter how often we check in there is never availability. This has been frustrating when planning special events. We would love to see this changed!!
